enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Matters relating to Protocol Article 6: Noting a recent workshop on Article 6 held in Moscow, the RUSSIAN FEDERATION emphasized the need for Parties to exchange information on, and prepare, joint implementation (JI) project proposals.
The EU said efforts to make JI operational should be intensified.
BUSINESS AND INDUSTRY urged the development of long-term approaches, that recognize economic development, poverty eradication and social development priorities.
